a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People left homeless from natural disasters, 1900 to 2023
Global number of people left homeless from natural disaster events. This is defined as "number of people whose
house is destroyed or heavily damaged and therefore need shelter after an event."
Note: Data includes disasters recorded up to September 2023.
